event.venueAddress: 18 Trần Phú, Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang

bride.name: Diệu Trang
bride.description: Today I will be the most beautiful and happiest bride. I hope we will always be happy like this, my dear.

groom.name: Chí Đạt
groom.description: No one is perfect, but we can complement each other. Love means knowing how to sacrifice and compromise with each other to live well.
